items.name: UpFromTheDepths Costume Skin
items.description:
This will override all other skins, acting as a full-body costume. Should always be set on Torso Armor.

Become the Famous ARK YouTuber, UpFromTheDepths!

items.name: Helicoprion Saddle
items.description: Equip a Helicoprion with this to ride it. Can also be used as a smithy!

items.name: Little Ratfish Treats!
items.description:
This specially blended pet food is a favorite for Helicoprion. Containing heavy mixes of the finest Cephalopods, it provides Helicoprion with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Be careful of the cloud of Ammonite Bile and other toxins that occur when they chomp into these little treats...

Calamari ~ So Divine!~~
